function getGameRandomNumber(bytes32 gameId, uint256 roundNumber, address player) returns (uint256)
function getOracleData() view returns (address oracleAddress, bytes32 methodId, bool useBackupRandomness, uint256 lastValue, uint256 lastTimestamp)
function getRandomInRange(uint256 min, uint256 max) returns (uint256)
function testOracleConnection() pure returns (bool success, uint256 value)
